verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Everlasting One
Nothing else compares
To knowing You
To knowing You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're the living God
And my soul it longs
To be with You
To be with You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Lord Your love is like a waterfall
Your love is like a flowing stream
And whenever I'm feeling dry
I come to the river, I come to the river of life

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are worthy Lord
Of every song that I could sing
That I could sing

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And my heart cries out
God I need You more than anything
Than anything

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
As the deer pants for the water
So my soul longs after You
